There is no photo on the right. The left page displays the photos of two individuals: Howard C. Harder and James W. McKee Jr., the Chairman and President respectively.

The image shows a document with a heading "To Our Shareholders" at the top, followed by the photos of two men, Howard C. Harder and James W. McKee Jr., the Chairman and President respectively, below which is a section titled "The year 1969 was the first under our new name CPC International Inc." The rest of the text on the page appears to be a corporate update from the company. The date at the bottom of the page indicates that this document was created on March 13, 1970.
